name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chatterclock — a ChatGPT message tracking extension

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tracks how many ChatGPT messages you’ve sent, segmented by model, to help you judge how close you are to ChatGPT quota limits.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ChatGPT limits the number of messages you can send to certain models (o1, o1-mini, gpt-4, gpt-4o, etc) over certain periods of time.

The ChatGPT UI tells you when you’ve exceeded your quota, but doesn’t tell you exactly how many messages you‘ve sent.

This extension tracks how many messages you‘ve sent to each model over a period of time — 1 week for o1, 24 hours for o1-mini, and 3 hours for other models, to help you judge how close to the limit you might be.
